front.title: Economic Decision Guide Software (EDGe) online tutorial

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.)

front.abstract: This report introduces features of the Economic Decision Guide Software (EDGe) Online Tool V 1.0 and presents a case study of wildfire planning in the wildland-urban interface (WUI). The case study highlights the competing interests of two neighboring communities by evaluating the same project alternatives from the point of view of each community. The WUI case study also demonstrates the importance of considering co-benefits and approaches to incorporating non- market valuation. The report presents a walkthrough of EDGe Online and closes with a discussion of implications from the presented case study and potential future research.
